content: Investments REITs Asked by AnonymousAsked on 03 Apr 2019How much money does one needs to invest in S-REITS to have a $1k passive income monthly? ?1 answerAnswerBump0

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 03 Apr 2019S-REITs give around 4% to even 10%. Taking 6% as an example, you would need $200,000 to have $12k annual passive income which is 1k per month.0 comments0
